name: Musk Deer, Swarm
description: The Musk Deer Swarm is a group of small, agile deer that can occupy the same space as other creatures and navigate through tiny openings. It has a unique appearance, with many deer moving together to create a fluid and cohesive form.
memorable: The swarm's ability to share space and its significant biting damage can be quite overwhelming in numbers.
goals: To evade threats and strike at opponents with quick, biting attacks.
relations: Often found in wooded areas, may coexist with other wildlife.
environment: Typically inhabits forested or natural environments.
strengths: Strong mobility and evasive maneuvers; resistant to many physical damage types.
weaknesses: Cannot regain hit points, making it vulnerable to focused attacks.
attacks: The swarm can perform a devastating bite attack, inflicting up to 18 piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Swarm ability allows it to occupy the space of other creatures and escape through tiny openings.
senses: Has a passive perception of 12, allowing it to detect hidden threats.
skills: It has trained perception skill that enhances its ability to notice nearby dangers.
additional_information: Immune to conditions like charmed and frightened.
Features a special ability to take the Dash action for enhanced movement.
The Musk ability can affect other creatures upon recharge.
Relies on swarm tactics rather than brute strength.
Resistant to common physical damage types.
test_queries: agile swarm of deer in the forest
nimble creature with significant bite damage
deer swarm that avoids physical attacks
medium swarm with strong evasive tactics
